IsShakerActive.Name: Shaker Is Active
IsShakerActive.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker mod is active.
ToggleShaker.Name: Toggle Shaker Keybind
ToggleShaker.Tooltip: Keybinding to toggle the AutoShaker on and off.
UsePlayerMagnetism.Name: Use Player Magnetism Distance?
UsePlayerMagnetism.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake bushes at the same distance players can pick up items. Note: Overrides '{{shakeDistanceName}}'
ShakeDistance.Name: Shake Distance
ShakeDistance.Tooltip: Distance to shake bushes when '{{playerMagnetismName}}' is disabled.
RegularTreePage.Title: Seed Trees
ShakeMahoganyTrees.Name: Shake Mahogany Trees?
ShakeMahoganyTrees.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Mahogany trees that you walk by for Mahogany Seeds.
ShakeMapleTrees.Name: Shake Maple Trees?
ShakeMapleTrees.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Maple trees that you walk by for Maple Seeds and Hazelnuts. NOTE: This is separate from forageable Hazelnuts.
ShakeOakTrees.Name: Shake Oak Trees?
ShakeOakTrees.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Oak trees that you walk by for Acorns.
ShakePalmTrees.Name: Shake Palm Trees?
ShakePalmTrees.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Palm trees that you walk by for Coconuts.
ShakePineTrees.Name: Shake Pine Trees?
ShakePineTrees.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Pine trees that you walk by for Pine Cones.
FruitTreePage.Title: Fruit Trees
FruitsReadyToShake.Name: Minimum Fruits Ready to Shake
FruitsReadyToShake.Tooltip: Minimum amount of fruits a Fruit Tree should have ready before the AutoShaker shakes the tree.
ShakeAppleTrees.Name: Shake Apple Trees?
ShakeAppleTrees.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Apple trees that you walk by for Apples.
ShakeApricotTrees.Name: Shake Apricot Trees?
ShakeApricotTrees.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Apricot trees that you walk by for Apricots.
ShakeBananaTrees.Name: Shake Banana Trees?
ShakeBananaTrees.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Banana trees that you walk by for Bananas.
ShakeCherryTrees.Name: Shake Cherry Trees?
ShakeCherryTrees.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Cherry trees that you walk by for Cherries.
ShakeMangoTrees.Name: Shake Mango Trees?
ShakeMangoTrees.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Mango trees that you walk by for Mangos.
ShakeOrangeTrees.Name: Shake Orange Trees?
ShakeOrangeTrees.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Orange trees that you walk by for Oranges.
ShakePeachTrees.Name: Shake Peach Trees?
ShakePeachTrees.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Peach trees that you walk by for Peaches.
ShakePomegranateTrees.Name: Shake Pomegranate Trees?
ShakePomegranateTrees.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Pomegranate trees that you walk by for Pomegranates
BushesPage.Title: Bushes
ShakeSalmonberries.Name: Shake Salmonberry Bushes?
ShakeSalmonberries.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake bushes that you walk by for Salmonberries.
ShakeBlackberries.Name: Shake Blackberry Bushes?
ShakeBlackberries.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake bushes that you walk by for Blackberries.
ShakeTeaBushes.Name: Shake Tea Bushes?
ShakeTeaBushes.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Tea bushes that you walk by for Tea Leaves.
ShakeWalnutBushes.Name: Shake Golden Walnut Bushes?
ShakeWalnutBushes.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will shake Walnut bushes that you walk by for Golden Walnuts.
ForageablesPage.Title: Forageables
PullDaffodils.Name: Pull Up Daffodils?
PullDaffodils.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Daffodils that you walk by.
PullDandelions.Name: Pull Up Dandelions?
PullDandelions.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Dandelions that you walk by.
PullLeeks.Name: Pull Up Leeks?
PullLeeks.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Leeks that you walk by.
PullSpringOnions.Name: Pull Up Spring Onions?
PullSpringOnions.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Spring Onions that you walk by.
PullWildHorseradishes.Name: Pull Up Wild Horseradishes?
PullWildHorseradishes.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Wild Horseradishes that you walk by.
PullGrapes.Name: Pull Up Grapes?
PullGrapes.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Grapes that you walk by.
PullSpiceBerries.Name: Pull Up Spice Berries?
PullSpiceBerries.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Spice Berries that you walk by.
PullSweetPeas.Name: Pull Up Sweet Peas?
PullSweetPeas.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Sweet Peas that you walk by.
PullHazelnuts.Name: Pull Up Hazelnuts?
PullHazelnuts.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Hazelnuts that you walk by. NOTE: This is separate from Hazelnuts that come from shaking Maple Trees.
PullWildPlums.Name: Pull Up Wild Plums?
PullWildPlums.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Wild Plums that you walk by.
PullCrocuses.Name: Pull Up Crocuses?
PullCrocuses.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Crocuses that you walk by.
PullCrystalFruits.Name: Pull Up Crystal Fruits?
PullCrystalFruits.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Crystal Fruits that you walk by.
PullHolly.Name: Pull Up Holly?
PullHolly.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Holly that you walk by.
DigSnowYams.Name: Dig Up Snow Yams?
DigSnowYams.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will dig up Snow Yams that you walk by. NOTE: This only checks Artifact Spots, a.k.a 'worms', 'stems', or 'twigs', and will only dig up the spot if it holds a Snow Yam.
DigWinterRoots.Name: Dig Up Winter Roots?
DigWinterRoots.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will dig up Winter Roots that you walk by. NOTE: This only checks Artifact Spots, a.k.a 'worms', 'stems', or 'twigs', and will only dig up the spot if it holds a Winter Root.
PullChanterelles.Name: Pull Up Chanterelle Mushrooms?
PullChanterelles.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Chanterelle mushrooms that you walk by.
PullCommonMushrooms.Name: Pull Up Common Mushrooms?
PullCommonMushrooms.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Common Mushrooms that you walk by.
PullMagmaCaps.Name: Pull Up Magma Caps?
PullMagmaCaps.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Magma Caps that you walk by.
PullMorels.Name: Pull Up Morel Mushrooms?

PullPurpleMushrooms.Name: Pull Up Purple Mushrooms?
PullPurpleMushrooms.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Purple Mushrooms that you walk by.
PullRedMushrooms.Name: Pull Up Red Mushrooms?
PullRedMushrooms.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Red Mushrooms that you walk by.
PullClams.Name: Pull Up Clams?
PullClams.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Clams that you walk by.
PullCockles.Name: Pull Up Cockles?
PullCockles.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Cockles that you walk by.

PullCoral.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Coral that you walk by.
PullMussels.Name: Pull Up Mussels?

PullOysters.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Oysters that you walk by.

PullRainbowShells.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Rainbow Shells that you walk by.
PullSeaUrchins.Name: Pull Up Sea Urchins?
PullSeaUrchins.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Sea Urchins that you walk by.
PullSeaweed.Name: Pull Up Seaweed?
PullSeaweed.Tooltip: Whether or not the AutoShaker will pull up Seaweed that you walk by.
